pages.text: -Creepers explosions deal mining fatigue and weakness.$(br2)-Creepers ignite with explosion damage.$(br2)-Default Creepers don't grief anymore.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Phantoms can see and fly through blocks.$(br2)-Phantoms are repelled by light.$(br2)-Phantoms are translucent.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Slimes can spawn with more than one size.$(br2)-Small and normal sized slimes can merge.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Zombies have natural knockback resistance.$(br2)-Zombies can spawn as a leader or siege one.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Drowned spawn more often with a trident.$(br2)-Drowned have a better swimming animation.$(br2)-Baby drowneds can spawn riding a guardian.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Skeletons flee if the player is too close.$(br2)-Skeletons can swim.$(br2)-Skeletons can have spectral arrows

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Strays flee if the player is too close.$(br2)-Strays can swim.$(br2)-Strays shoots frozen arrows.$(br2)-Strays deal slowness 2.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Wither skeletons are immune to fire damage.$(br2)-Wither skeletons can spawn with a bow.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Silverfishs take no fall damage.$(br2)-Silverfish have a random speed bonus.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Endermites take no fall damage.$(br2)-Endermites have a random speed bonus.$(br2)-Chorus plants are infested with endermites.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Spiders take no fall damage.$(br2)-Spiders can spawn baby spiders on death.$(br2)-Spiders can launch webs.$(br2)-Cave Spider jockeys can spawn.$(br2)-Cave spiders can spawn naturally in caves.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Pillagers get the piercing enchant more often.$(br2)-Pillagers can spawn with a speed bonus.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Vindicators can spawn in patrols.$(br2)-Vindicators can spawn with a speed bonus.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Witches flee if the player is too close.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Blaze set entities on fire on attack.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Magma cubes set entities on fire on collision.

pages.title: Vanilla Mobs changes
pages.text: -Get blindness when staring at a Enderman.
